settings.title: What are the various shipping methods offered at Kodiak?
settings.answer: We provide several shipping options to cater to your needs. These include Standard Shipping, Priority Processing , Rush Shipping¬†- COMING SOON, and Super Rush Shipping¬†- COMING SOON.

settings.title: Does Kodiak offer international shipping?
settings.answer: No, at this moment Kodiak does not provide international shipping outside of the United States.

settings.title: Can Kodiak deliver to APO/FPO addresses?
settings.answer: No, at this moment Kodiak does not provide¬†APO/FPO addresses.

settings.title: Can Kodiak deliver orders to multiple addresses?
settings.answer: Yes, we can split your order if needed for an additional charge. Please email us your needs at info@kodiak-coolers.com

settings.title: What should I do if my order doesn't arrive within the promised delivery window?
settings.answer: While we strive to meet all delivery deadlines, unforeseen delays may occur. If your order does not arrive as scheduled, please contact our Customer Care team for assistance.

settings.title: Which courier services does Kodiak use for shipping?
settings.answer: We partner with reliable courier services such as UPS to ensure safe and prompt delivery of your orders. The selection of our courier depends on the best costs and transit times for your specific order and location.

settings.title: Is expedited shipping an option at Kodiak?
settings.answer: Yes, we provide Standard Shipping, Rush, and Super Rush¬†- COMING SOON¬†shipping options for urgent orders. Please note that these options may entail an additional cost.
